name: diocesan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with a diocese (= an area controlled by a bishop): a diocesan bishop/priest a diocesan spokesman/newspaper See
diocese
More examplesFewer examplesIn ten years, diocesan leaders have shrunk the number of parishes from 194 to 175.Bishops continue to exercise great control over diocesan funds. The number of active diocesan clergy was projected to be at just over 15,000.
